src

time.h File Reference

Detailed Description

Time related conversion routines.

time_t is the POSIX time. min1900_t is the minutes from Jan 1, 1900

Definition in file time.h.

#include "dll.h"
#include <sys/time.h>
#include <time.h>
#include <stdint.h>
